# Blockquotes

## Simple Blockquote

> This is a simple blockquote.
> It spans multiple lines.

## Lazy Blockquote

> This blockquote starts with the marker
> but continues without markers on subsequent lines.
> Still part of the blockquote.

## Nested Blockquotes

> Level 1 quote
>
> > Level 2 nested quote
> >
> > > Level 3 deeply nested
>
> Back to level 1

## Blockquote with Markdown

> ## Heading in blockquote
>
> This is a paragraph with **bold** and _italic_.
>
> - List item 1
> - List item 2
>
> ```python
> def hello():
>     print("Hello from blockquote")
> ```

## Blockquote with Code

> Here's some example code:
>
>     return shell_exec("echo $input");
>
> The code above is indented.

## Multiple Paragraphs

> First paragraph in the blockquote.
>
> Second paragraph in the same blockquote.
>
> Third paragraph, still quoted.

## Attribution Style

> "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken."
>
> â€” Oscar Wilde
